snippet: Three British Muslims, including a convert who was featured in a documentary about radical Islam, pleaded guilty to terrorism charges in London on Friday.
abstract: British Muslims Richard Dart, Imran Mahmood and Jahangir Alom plead guilty to terrorism charges in London; men are accused of traveling to Pakistan with intention of committing terrorist acts.
lead_paragraph: Three British Muslims, including a convert who was featured in a documentary about radical Islam, pleaded guilty to terrorism charges in London on Friday.
